possible8ball: I am sorry, but I would rather not answer

welcoming.welcomeMessageDef: We've got a new member here! Welcome ##mention_user## to **##guild_name##**!

help.DMSentAlert: :incoming_envelope: The information has been sent to your DMs.
help.EmbedDesc: You can see a list of OxyBot commands here. You can have more detailed information at https://oxybot.freeappsw.space/help

cmds.number: Generate a random number between `a` and `b`, if not specified, 1 and 1000.
cmds.eightBall: Ask the Magic Eight-Ball a question
cmds.say: Sends `content` to chat. Note that message won't be anonymous
cmds.actions: List all actions from this guild
cmds.clearchat: Removes `x` messages from chat. Messages older than 14 days can't be removed

help.EmbedFooter:
<arg> - mandatory argument, [arg] - optional argument;
*-not available yet in this build

actions.EmbedDesc: Here you can see a list of all custom actions available in this guild
actions.ErrorActionsNotFoundEmbedDesc: This guild does not have any actions
actions.SuccessDoneMinusRole: The role `##role_name##` has been removed from user.
actions.SuccessDonePlusRole: The role `##role_name##` has been added to user.
actions.ErrorCantAddRole: The bot was unable to add the role. Perhaps, it lacks permissions?
actions.ErrorCantRemoveRole: The bot was unable to remove the role. Perhaps, it lacks permissions?

about.EmbedDesc: OxyBot is a multipurpose Discord.js bot made by [FreeAppSW](https://www.freeappsw.space) as a part of [Oxy-series](https://www.freeappsw.space/oxyseries/).

eightBall.EmbedDesc: Let the magic of the Eight-Ball answer your question!

clearChat.BotCantDeleteError: There was an error while deleting messages. Perhaps, the bot is missing **Manage Messages** permission?
